question.title: Promise Pool
question.similarQuestions: [{"title": "Sleep", "titleSlug": "sleep", "difficulty": "Easy", "translatedTitle": "\u7761\u7720\u51fd\u6570", "isPaidOnly": false}, {"title": "Promise Time Limit", "titleSlug": "promise-time-limit", "difficulty": "Medium", "translatedTitle": "\u6709\u65f6\u95f4\u9650\u5236\u7684 Promise \u5bf9\u8c61", "isPaidOnly": false}, {"title": "Cache With Time Limit", "titleSlug": "cache-with-time-limit", "difficulty": "Medium", "translatedTitle": "\u6709\u65f6\u95f4\u9650\u5236\u7684\u7f13\u5b58", "isPaidOnly": false}, {"title": "Throttle", "titleSlug": "throttle", "difficulty": "Medium", "translatedTitle": "\u8282\u6d41", "isPaidOnly": true}]
hints: Initially execute all the functions until the queue fills up.
Every time a function resolves, add a new promise to the queue if possible.
question.sampleTestCase:
[() => new Promise(res => setTimeout(res, 300)), () => new Promise(res => setTimeout(res, 400)), () => new Promise(res => setTimeout(res, 200))]
2
